formulas.name: Nextanniversaryyear
formulas.expression: IF( TEXT({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Payee_Leave_Rule__r.Anniversary_Treatment__c}) = 'Reset - Calendar Year', DATE( YEAR({!varPLE.tc9_pr__End_Date__c}) + 1, 1, 1 ), IF( DATE( YEAR({!varPLE.tc9_pr__End_Date__c}), MONTH({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Payee__r.tc9_pr__Payroll_Start_Date__c}), DAY({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Payee__r.tc9_pr__Payroll_Start_Date__c}) ) > {!varPLE.tc9_pr__End_Date__c}, DATE( YEAR({!varPLE.tc9_pr__End_Date__c}), MONTH({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Payee__r.tc9_pr__Payroll_Start_Date__c}), DAY({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Payee__r.tc9_pr__Payroll_Start_Date__c}) ), DATE( YEAR({!varPLE.tc9_pr__End_Date__c}) + 1, MONTH({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Payee__r.tc9_pr__Payroll_Start_Date__c}), DAY({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Payee__r.tc9_pr__Payroll_Start_Date__c}) ) ) )

formulas.name: PreviousAnniversaryYear
formulas.expression: IF( TEXT({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Payee_Leave_Rule__r.Anniversary_Treatment__c}) = 'Reset - Calendar Year', DATE( YEAR({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Start_Date__c}), 1, 1 ), IF( DATE( YEAR({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Start_Date__c}), MONTH({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Payee__r.tc9_pr__Payroll_Start_Date__c}), DAY({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Payee__r.tc9_pr__Payroll_Start_Date__c}) ) <= {!varPLE.tc9_pr__Start_Date__c}, DATE( YEAR({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Start_Date__c}), MONTH({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Payee__r.tc9_pr__Payroll_Start_Date__c}), DAY({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Payee__r.tc9_pr__Payroll_Start_Date__c}) ), DATE( YEAR({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Start_Date__c}) - 1, MONTH({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Payee__r.tc9_pr__Payroll_Start_Date__c}), DAY({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Payee__r.tc9_pr__Payroll_Start_Date__c}) ) ) )

formulas.name: ResetDate
formulas.expression: IF( TEXT({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Payee_Leave_Rule__r.Anniversary_Treatment__c}) = 'Reset - Calendar Year', DATE( YEAR({!Last_Day_of_Leave}), 1, 1 ), IF( TEXT({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Payee_Leave_Rule__r.Anniversary_Treatment__c}) = 'Reset - Hire Date', DATE( YEAR({!First_Day_of_Leave}), MONTH({!varPayee.tc9_pr__Payroll_Start_Date__c}), DAY({!varPayee.tc9_pr__Payroll_Start_Date__c}) ), NULL ) )

formulas.name: UpcomingAnniversarydate
formulas.expression: IF( TEXT({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Payee_Leave_Rule__r.Anniversary_Treatment__c}) = 'Reset - Calendar Year', DATE( YEAR({!varPLE.tc9_pr__End_Date__c}), 1, 1 ), IF( DATE( YEAR({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Start_Date__c}), MONTH({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Payee__r.tc9_pr__Payroll_Start_Date__c}), DAY({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Payee__r.tc9_pr__Payroll_Start_Date__c}) ) > {!varPLE.tc9_pr__Start_Date__c}, DATE( YEAR({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Start_Date__c}), MONTH({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Payee__r.tc9_pr__Payroll_Start_Date__c}), DAY({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Payee__r.tc9_pr__Payroll_Start_Date__c}) ), DATE( YEAR({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Start_Date__c}) + 1, MONTH({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Payee__r.tc9_pr__Payroll_Start_Date__c}), DAY({!varPLE.tc9_pr__Payee__r.tc9_pr__Payroll_Start_Date__c}) ) ) )

fields.name: DebugText
fields.fieldText:
Leave Hours in Request = "IF(ISPICKVAL(!varPLE.Leave_Type_Full_Part_Day__c}, "Part Day"), !formulaPLETotalHours}, !TotalHoursforPLE})"


"!formulaPLETotalHours}" = {!formulaPLETotalHours}

= "!formulaEndTime} - !formulaStartTime}"


Which equals = {!formulaStartTime} and {!formulaEndTime}


"!TotalHoursforPLE}" = {!TotalHoursforPLE}


Total Hours for PLE is Adding "!CycleScheduleItemsCountHours.NET_Total_Hours__c}"


PLUS: Forecast Leave Hours to be Accrued = "{!CountAccrualForecastHours}"


Get Schedule items in accural range. Filters include:

tc9_pr__Work_Schedule__c = {!getAssignmentSchedule.tc9_pr__Work_Schedule__c}

tc9_pr__Entry_Date__c greater than {!lastPayrollDate}

tc9_pr__Shift_Total_Time__c > 0

tc9_pr__Entry_Date__c <= {!FormulaLastDay}

tc9_pr__Entry_Date__c not in Unpaid Leave Dates


!CountAccrualForecastHours = "!FormulaAccuralHoursCalculated}"


"!FormulaAccuralHoursCalculated}" = "!varNETHOURS} * case(!cycleLeaveRuleItems.tc9_pr__Accrual_Type__c},

"Units per Hour Worked",!cycleLeaveRuleItems.tc9_pr__Accrual_Rate__c} ,0)"


"!varNETHOURS}" = "!cycleScheduleItemsINLeaveRuleItemRange.NET_Total_Hours__c}"


"!CountAccrualForecastHours} ADD {!FormulaAccuralHoursCalculated


{!FormulaAccuralHoursCalculated = !varNETHOURS} * case(!cycleLeaveRuleItems.tc9_pr__Accrual_Type__c},

"Units per Hour Worked",!cycleLeaveRuleItems.tc9_pr__Accrual_Rate__c} ,0)
